channel.title: Can Someone Help Me With Getting My Server Online
channel.description:
Hey guys my server used to be online for awhile a year or two.. Then my router crashed and fucked me up the ass... I got a new one, took some time getting into my Default Gateway host to portforward, but anyway, i did it, Got in and i believe ive portforwarded PERFECTLY but, still no one can connect to the server, and it's getting annoying, if theres someone out there that has T.V that could help me, please leave a message or add me on MSN PLEASE!! if helped i will give you Co-Owner on server if you want it..
I'm using evolution-X source, but i know it works, because ive seen like 500 diffferent servers with that base..Im not new to all this to be honest, but this has just blown my mind.. I'll tell you where i've started from.
-I've portforwarded perfectly (so I believe)
-Dont think these have a role, but my enviormental variables are good, like CLASSPATH & PATH are perfect.
-Server's running with No-Ip and I have my ip in the client for others to connect, even tried my exact IP address instead of the no-ip.org.
-Tried many clients over and over again.
-I can connect with 127.0.0.0 or whatever, or localhost. (but no one can connect to my server other than me.)
MSN: killacam31600@yahoo.com

item.title: Can Someone Help Me With Getting My Server Online
item.dc:creator: @Bonjour Bonjour
item.description:
@Bonjour wrote:

ugh please someone give me there MSN, or take time to look into this for me, i need help very much! PLEASE!

Read full topic
